Key Match Events: Julian Alvarez scored the opening goal for Argentina in the 48th minute
Lautaro Martinez doubled Argentina's lead in the 87th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: Maxime Crepeau made 6 saves for Canada, while Emiliano Martinez made 2 for Argentina
Others: The match took place at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta
Argentina and Canada will play again on Tuesday, with Argentina facing Chile and Canada playing Peru
